DOC.brief_summary: In vitro study show hydrogel material uptake lysozyme hydrogel material protein remain largely active promotes reduce cytokine response vitro culture human corneal epithelial cell . This study investigate whether data transfer vivo situation .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Laboratory Study Lysozyme Deposition Daily Disposable Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must read , understand , sign Statement Informed Consent receive fully execute copy form . 2 . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 3 . The subject must willing follow instruction maintain appointment schedule . 4 . The subject must 18 40 year age ( inclusive ) . 5 . The subject 's vertex correct spherical equivalent distance refraction must range 0.50D 6.00D eye ( inclusive ) . 6 . The subject 's refractive cylinder must exceed 1.25DC eye vertexing corneal plane . 7 . The subject must current wearer spherical , soft contact lens ( toric , bifocal multifocal contact lens , extend wear monovision ) least 5 days/week least 8 hours/day month prior enrollment . 8 . The subject must wearable pair spectacle wear day initial visit . 9 . The subject must exist wearer spherical soft contact lenses eye . 10 . The subject must normal eye ( i.e. , ocular medication infection type ) . 11 . The subject must able wear study lenses minimum seven hour per day . 1 . Any ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear ( investigator 's discretion ) . 2 . Any systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may interfere contact lens wear ( investigator 's discretion ) . 3 . Currently pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . 4 . Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease . 5 . Any active ocular infection . 6 . Is use topical medication include artificial tear ( ATS ) two week prior screen visit . 7 . Any participant whose habitual contact lens use extend wear regimen . 8 . Entropion , ectropion , extrusion , chalazia , recurrent stye , glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , aphakia , moderate corneal distortion keratometry . 9 . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear ; clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) tarsal abnormality bulbar injection might interfere contact lens wear . 10 . Any know hypersensitivity allergic reaction study product . 11 . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within seven day prior study enrollment . 12 . Employee family member Center Contact Lens Research ( e.g. , Investigator , Coordinator , Technician ) .
